question: Hi i am hanafi and i have some brown stains in my teeth i was just wondering does it invaild my wudu and ghusl when washing once mouth during wudu and ghusl or it does not effect my wudu and ghusl, thank you for your time
answer:
QUESTION

Hi  i am hanafi and  i have some brown stains in my teeth i was just wondering  does it  invaild my  wudu and ghusl when washing once mouth during wudu and ghusl or it does not effect my wudu and ghusl, thank you for your time

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

The brown stains on your teeth does not invalidate your wudu and ghusal.

(Aap kay Masail, Vol.2 ,Pg.52, Maktabah Bayyinaat)

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum
